qas.question: How long it will take for express laundry?
Is there any additional charges for express laundry?
Does the additional charges for all items?

paragraphs.context: Our Express laundry service will return your items within 5 hours. Each item is subject to 50% additional charge.

qas.question: What time items will be collected for regular laundry service?
What will be the delivery time for regular laundry service?
What time it will be delivered if items collected after 10 am?

paragraphs.context: Our Regular Laundry Service: Items collected before 10am will be delivered between 6-8pm same day. Items collected after 10am will be delivered 10am-12pm on the following day.

qas.question: How long it will take for regular pressing?

paragraphs.context: Our regular pressing service will return your collected items within 4 hours.

qas.question: Is there any additional charges applicable?
How long it will take for express pressing?

paragraphs.context: Our express pressing service will deliver the collected items within an hour, Subject to a 50% additional charge.

qas.question: What is the contact number to reach the reservations team for room booking?
What is the email to reach the Reservations Team for room booking?
What information you need for call back?

answers.text: contact details including your e-mail address

paragraphs.context: Kindly provide us your contact details including your e-mail address and our Reservations Team shall get back to you.Alternatively, you may also reach them at +971 4 364 7555 or you may send an e-mail to reservations@abc.com.

qas.question: Which wifi network can be used?
Does it requires any credentials?

answers.text: open a web browser and click on the CONNECT button

paragraphs.context: To set up the Wi-Fi please select the network iJumeirah.This will present a welcome to Jumeirah page - Please click the CONNECT button and you shall be connected. Or otherwise, open a web browser and click on the CONNECT button.

qas.question: What is the breakfast serving period in Mundo during weekdays?
What is the breakfast serving period in Mundo during weekends?
Where is the Mundo restaurant located?
Which restaurant serves buffet breakfast?

paragraphs.context: Buffet breakfast is served in Mundo located in the lobby level (UL) daily from 6am till 11am during weekdays and from 6am till 11:30am on Fridays and Saturdays.

qas.question: What does it require to bring my car from valet parking?

paragraphs.context: Certainly. Please ensure to collect all your valuable belongings from the safe and passports. May we ask how many bags would you be having and if you need any transfer arrangements? If you have a car in our parking you may give us your valet parking ticket details so we may have it ready by the hotel entrance. Please ensure to collect all your valuable belongings from the safe and passports.

qas.question: Where is the Al Nafoorah restaurant located in hotel?
What is the cuisine of Al Nafoorah Restaurant?
What time the lunch served in Al Nafoorah Restaurant?

answers.text: 12:00 to 15:30 during Sundays to Thursdays, from 12:00 to 16:00 during Fridays and Saturdays

qas.question: What time the dinner served in Al Nafoorah Restaurant?
What is the dress code in Al Nafoorah?

paragraphs.context: We have Al Nafoorah Restaurant which serves Lebanese cuisine located in lower level of The Boulevard. They serve lunch from 12:00 to 15:30 during Sundays to Thursdays, from 12:00 to 16:00 during Fridays and Saturdays while they serve dinner 18:00 to 23:30 daily. Please take note that the dress code is Smart Casual.

qas.question: What is the cuisine of Mundo Restaurant?
When is the breakfast served in Mundo Restaurant?

answers.text: 06:00 to 11:00 during Sundays to Thursdays and from 06:00 to 11:30 during Fridays and Saturdays

qas.question: What is the price per person for breakfast in Mundo?
When is the lunch served in Mundo Restaurant?

answers.text: 12:30 to 15:00 during Sundays to Thursdays and Saturdays from 13:00 to 15:00

qas.question: What is the price per person for lunch in Mundo??
When is the dinner served in Mundo Restaurant?
What is the price per person for Dinner in Mundo?

paragraphs.context: We have the Mundo Restaurant serving International Cuisine which offers Breakfast from 06:00 to 11:00 during Sundays to Thursdays and from 06:00 to 11:30 during Fridays and Saturdays for AED 160 per person. Lunch is served from 12:30 to 15:00 during Sundays to Thursdays and Saturdays from 13:00 to 15:00 for AED 180 per person. Lastly, Dinner is served from 19:00 to 22:00 during Sundays to Thursdays for AED 200 per person.

qas.question: Where is the Alta Badia Bar located?
What cuisine is server in Alta Badia Bar?
What is the serving timings in Alta Badia Bar?
What is the average cost for 2 persons in Alta Badia Bar?

answers.text: AED 250 for two persons without alcoholic beverages

qas.question: What is the dress code in Alta Badia Bar?

paragraphs.context: We have Alta Badia Bar located on the 51st floor of the hotel which offers beverages and Italian cicchetti (light bites). They are open from 16:00 to 03.00 daily and has a smart casual dress code. You may spend approximately AED 250 for two persons without alcoholic beverages.

qas.question: Where is the Rib Room restaurant located?
What cuisine is server in Rib Room Restaurant?
When is the lunch served in Rib Room Restaurant?
When is the dinner served in Rib Room Restaurant?
What is the average cost for 2 people in Rib Room?
What is the dress code in Rib Room?

paragraphs.context: We have Rib Room Restaurant which is a steakhouse located at the lobby of the hotel. They serve lunch during Sundays to Thursdays from 12:00 to 15:00 and Dinner during Sundays to Saturdays from 18:00 to 23:00. Average cost for two persons is AED 600 without alcoholic beverage. Please take note that the dress code is smart casual.

qas.question: What is the cost of pool access for non-staying men?
What is the cost of pool access for non-staying women?
What is the cost of pool access for non-staying children?

answers.text: AED 55 for children between the ages of 5 and 12 years

qas.question: Whats the Pool Bar timings?
What time we can use beach?
What time we can use pool?
What is the average temperature of the swimming pool?
What is the age limit for Children’s pool facilities?
What is the timing for Children’s pool facilities?

paragraphs.context: Our Pool Bar offers beverages and light snacks and is open from 07:00 to 21:00 daily with a casual beach attire dress code. For non-staying guests, the pool can be accessed for AED 105 for men, AED 95 for women and AED 55 for children between the ages of 5 and 12 years old. Any guests under the age of 16 years old may enjoy our pool facilities from 14:30 to 17:00 daily. Our pools are open from 9AM until sunset and beach are open from 7AM until sunset.The temperature of the swimming pool averages at 27 - 28 degrees Celsius.

qas.question: What are the options available for PCR Test?
What is the PCR test cost with VIP doctor?
How long will it take for test results from VIP doctor?

answers.text: 24hrs (result duration may vary based on the Covid situation)

qas.question: What is the PCR test cost from Mera Labs?
How long will it take for test results from Mera Labs?
What is the PCR test cost from Mera Labs for fast track test results?
How long will it take for fast track test results from Mera Labs?

paragraphs.context: Good day. Kindly see below options for the PCR test. Please be advised that timings will be subject to availability. 1. VIP Doctor: • Charges will be AED300/ sample • Test result will be received within 24hrs (result duration may vary based on the Covid situation) 2. Mera Labs: • Service is available between 0930H to 1600H Saturday to Thursday. • The request must be submitted 24hrs in advance • Charges will be AED165/ sample for a regular test (results will be received within 24hrs which may vary based on the situation) • Charges will be AED325/ sample if the test result is required with in 6 to 8hrs

qas.question: What is the doctor visit charges?

paragraphs.context: We have a Doctor-On –Call available in the next 45 minutes. Please be advised that visit charges will be 700 AED. May we assist you to speak with a doctor first?

qas.question: What are the hotel facilities which can be used?

answers.text: Outdoor swimming pool, The Talise Fitness Gym and The Talise Spa

qas.question: What is the operating time for Outdoor Swimming Pool?
What is the operating time for The Talise Fitness Gym?
What is the operating time for The Talise Spa?
How can we visit the the Dubai Mall?

answers.text: complimentary shuttle service to take you to these locations

qas.question: Where can we use the the complimentary access?

answers.text: Wild Wadi Water Park and to the Private beach

paragraphs.context: You may choose to use our hotel facilities such as our Outdoor swimming pool, The Talise Fitness Gym and The Talise Spa which opens from 07:00 to 22:00, the Talise Fitness Gym which is open from 05:30 to 22:30, the Talise Spa which is open from 09:00 to 22:00 daily. You may also choose to use your complimentary access to Wild Wadi Water Park and to the Private beach in either Jumeirah Beach Hotel or Jumeirah Mina A’Salam Hotel or visit the Dubai Mall which is nearby. We provide complimentary shuttle service to take you to these locations at certain times each day. You may approach any of our colleagues for the schedule or let us know and we will send it to you.

qas.question: Do you have salon for ladies?
What are the working hours for ladies salon?
What is the salon for men?
What are the working hours for men salon?
Where are the salons located?

paragraphs.context: We have a salon for ladies named Jet Set Altitude which opens from 09:00 until 22:00 and also a salon for men named 1847 which opens from 09:00 until 22:00 everyday. Both are located on the 1st Level of the Boulevard.

qas.question: Can I leave my luggage after check out?
Where it will be kept?

paragraphs.context: Certainly. We can store your luggage with our Concierge desk and you may collect it prior to leaving the resort premises.

qas.question: Can I leave my luggage if the room is not ready?
Where can i leave my luggage?

answers.text: Our Bell team will assist you to store luggage

paragraphs.context: Certainly. Our Bell team will assist you to store luggage until your room is ready.

qas.question: Who can assist us to book rent a car?
How can I book a Safari Tour?

paragraphs.context: Certainly. Our Concierge Desk will be delighted to assist you.Good day. We have forwarded your request to our concierge team and they will get in touch with you shortly.

qas.question: How much does parking cost?

paragraphs.context: The car parking facility is complimentary for our resident guests.

qas.question: Can I pay by credit card?
What are all the cards accepted?

answers.text: Visa, MasterCard, JCB, American Express, Diners Club and Union Pay cards

paragraphs.context: Certainly. We accept Visa, MasterCard, JCB, American Express, Diners Club and Union Pay cards.

qas.question: Where should we store the belongings while exercising?

paragraphs.context: We have lockers available to store your belongings while you exercise.

qas.question: Is it possible to check-in early?

answers.text: depending on availability of the rooms

qas.question: What is the standard check-in time?
What should be done in case of arrival before 10:00 AM?

answers.text: book your room one day prior to ensure room is ready

paragraphs.context: Early check-in will be depending on availability of the rooms. Once your room is ready we will ensure to check you in as soon as we can. However, if the room is still being prepared, you may choose to use our hotel facilities and we shall store your luggage for you.Our standard check in time at 15:00 O'clock ,if you arrive prior to 10:00 in the morning local time, we recommend you book your room one day prior to ensure room is ready when arriving the hotel.

qas.question: What is the standard check-out time?
What are the options available for a guaranteed late check-out?

answers.text: late check out until 6pm at a half day rate, post that a full day

paragraphs.context: The check-out time is 12NN. Kindly let us know your departure time, we will do our best to meet your request subject to availability. If you wish to guarantee your late check out we can offer a late check out until 6pm at a half day rate, post that a full day would be applied.

qas.question: What is the website of the hotel?

paragraphs.context: The website of the hotel is https://www.jumeirah.com

qas.question: Where can we get the job vacancies?

answers.text: our website www.jumeirah.com and click on careers

paragraphs.context: This platform is only for hotel guest usage. For job vacancies, I would appreciate if you could kindly check our website www.jumeirah.com and click on careers. Thank you and I wish you all the very best in your future career.

qas.question: What will be the usual response time of Guest Relations Team?

paragraphs.context: Thank you for your message. Kindly be advised that our Guest Relations Team is currently out of office and will be able to respond to your query within 07:00 – 23:00. Should you require any further assistance, please do let us know. Best Regards, Jumeirah at Saadiyat Islands Resort.

qas.question: What is the process to get new room key?

answers.text: front desk will issue the new room key

paragraphs.context: For security reasons you need to go to the Reception with an identity document and my colleagues at the front desk will issue the new room key.

qas.question: How can we turn on/off the AC?

answers.text: lightly touch the middle button to turn on/off

qas.question: How to change the temperature?

paragraphs.context: There is an A/C panel by your bed side. You may lightly touch the middle button to turn on/off and to change the temperature you may lightly touch +/-.

qas.question: How can we access newspapers/magazines?

paragraphs.context: We would like to introduce you our Press Reader app where you can have access to thousands of newspapers and magazines on our compliments, below is the link to access to it. https://www.pressreader.com/catalog Please let us know if we could be of any further assistance.
